array.string:
The configuration has a National Instruments device which requires the NI-488.2 drivers. These drivers are available online at www.ni.com
For Intel: http://joule.ni.com/nidu/cds/view/p/id/419/lang/en For PPC: http://joule.ni.com/nidu/cds/view/p/id/342/lang/en
Currently the Intel drivers are only available in beta.
Acknowledging this alarm will make it go away.
